articles.title: NASA successfully tests SLS rocket that will help Artemis astronauts reach the moon - CNN
articles.description: The Space Launch System rocket that will launch NASA's Artemis astronauts into space on their way to the moon went through a final and successful hot-fire test of the core stage on Thursday.
